thread.title: Star Wars items top lists of hottest toys of 2015
thread.title_full: Star Wars items top lists of hottest toys of 2015

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Star Wars items top lists of hottest toys of 2015
text:
Entertainment Dining Shop O Matic Star Wars items top lists of hottest toys of 2015 
With "Star Wars: Episode VII the Force Awakens," opening on Dec. 18, BB-8 Droids and talking Yoda dolls hard to find, will be. Here's a list of this holiday season's hottest toys, according to Toys R Us, Amazon, Walmart and Target. (Doreen Christensen) Expensive Star Wars toys are topping lists for hottest toys of 2015. 
My the force be with you searching for hot Stars Wars toys this holiday season. 
With "Star Wars: Episode VII the Force Awakens," set to open on Dec. 18, expensive electronic toys like the BB-8 App Enabled Droids, flying Millennium Falcons and talking Yoda dolls hard to find, will be. 
If you do find them a galazy far, far away, buy them. Be prepared to pay big: The BB-8 App-Controlled Droid runs about $150 and the R2D2 Droid costs more than $300. 
Alas, Frozen still rules, too. "Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens" trailer
